0: In this level you will apply what you learned in the tutorial. You will be the reciever from last round, and while you are chosing your color, you will have no idea what the sender is chosing.
1: After you guys each choose your colors, you will then be able to compare what you've chosen, let's go ahead and do some pracice
2: You and alice will choose your colors at the same time, start picking!
3: Okay, that's enough for now! The sender also spent their time choosing some numbers to send, let's see what each of you sent! Open your journal to take a look.
4: In your notebook you have the colors that the sender sent their numbers in, as well as your own colors, and by your colors is the number you received. Some of the information that was sent is useful while some isn't.
5: Keep the tutorial in mind! Which nubers do you know are the same as the ones the sender sent? Use the Keep and Reject buttons to indicate what information is useful
